trans-unit.source:
Hej %firstName%,

thank you for registering with Matchico. From now on, you will benefit from our network of selected specialists. We will also be happy to talk to you in person to discuss further steps. Simply select a suitable date under the following link: https://calendly.com/michel-rothgaenger.

In the meantime, if you have any questions about any of our services, simply reply to this e-mail. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Michel Rothgaenger
Chief Operating Officer
Matchico

Matchico
trans-unit.target:
Hi %firstname%,

Thank you for creating your Transport Talent employer account and for taking the first step towards improving your hiring process! One of our team members will reach out to you in the next days to help you get started.

In the meantime, if you have any questions about completing your profile or about any of our services, just reply to this email and we will get back to you right away.

Michel Rothgaenger
Managing Director
Transport Talent
